title: Cancer Unit
details: Here this is the cancer unit of the hospital. Our main goal is to try and protect our patient as dearly as we can to help them having the days here as enjoyable as possible for them.

title: Heart Unit
details: Here our main goal is to help the patient with a lot of care and love. Heart is a sensitive organ of the body and we want to help our patient as better and fast as possible.

title: Burn Unit
details: Burning of any part of the body can be very painful and in time to time it could get severe. lots of people die everyday due to burning cause. Here we try to provide the best service possible.

title: Delivery Baby Unit
details: It is a pretty exciting moment for the fellow family and relatives to welcome a new family member in their family. Doctor had to play a vital role..

title: Emergency Room
details: Emergency room is a place usually when people come with severe injury that needs immediate treatment. We have excellent doctors and nurses to be ready for any kind of problems at any time.

title: Surgical Unit
details: Surgeons are like the front people on the row who is like police. They fight directly with the problems. The patient feels more secured when the surgery is done by a proper experienced doctors.
